short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Searches for and populates list of links that have a rel attribute value equal to 'nofollow'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:

Nofollow Links Finder is a handy Chrome extension that helps you quickly identify links on any webpage with a 'nofollow' attribute. With just a click, you can easily view all links marked as 'nofollow', allowing you to gain insights into the website's linking strategy and optimize your SEO efforts accordingly. Whether you're a digital marketer, SEO professional, or simply curious about the structure of webpages, Nofollow Links Finder provides a convenient way to explore and analyze links on the web.

Key Features:

    Instantly identify links with the 'nofollow' attribute on any webpage.
    Simple interface for usage.
    Helps you understand website linking strategies and optimize SEO efforts.
    Lightweight and unobtrusive Chrome extension, perfect for everyday use.

How to Use:

    Install the Nofollow Links Finder extension from the Chrome Web Store.
    Browse to any webpage you'd like to analyze.*
    Click on the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar and press "Run" to view all links with the 'nofollow' attribute.

*Note:

Not all pages will allow you to scrape. Use responsibly and preferably with sites you own or manage SEO for.
